text: Shelby Fredrick "Sheb" Wooley (April 10, 1921 â€“ September 16, 2003) was an American actor and country pop singer. He was best known for his 1958 novelty song "The Purple People Eater". He played Frank Miller, in the movie High Noon, Travis Cobb in The Outlaw Josey Wales and Pete Nolan in the television series Rawhide. He is best known as the voice actor of the Wilhelm scream sound effect. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:American country singers Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Oklahoma Category:Singers from Oklahoma
title: Sheb Wooley
